items.sentence: Tom and I are going to talk about what happened.
Tom and I discussed the problem with each other.
Tom and I have been close friends for years now.
Tom makes $900 a week working at a resort hotel.
Tom makes three times more money than Mary does.
Tom managed to finish the work without any help.
Tom married the most beautiful girl in the city.
Tom met Mary for the first time three years ago.
Please don\'t tell anybody what I just told you.
Tell Tom that when he\'s finished, he can leave.
Tom wanted to know where Mary had spent the day.
Tom was wearing flip-flops and a Hawaiian shirt.
Did you tell Tom he\'s not allowed in this room?
Didn\'t you go to Boston for a week last summer?
It never dawned on me that I would be a suspect.
My little sister painted a picture of a snowman.
My parents never punished me for anything I did.
My sister took care of the dog while I was away.
I wish I didn\'t have to go to Boston next week.
I wish I hadn\'t skipped breakfast this morning.
I don\'t think we should tell Tom what Mary did.
I don\'t think you should eat so much junk food.
Tom was surprised that Mary had changed so much.
Tom was the last person I expected to see there.
Tom came pretty close to getting hit by a truck.
All the old men in our village have long beards.
Tom knew Mary understood what they needed to do.
Tom lives in a house on the edge of the village.
Tom told the judge he wanted a different lawyer.
Tom said that you speak French better than Mary.
Tom tried to think of something that would help.
How can Tom possibly do this anymore at his age?
How do you know that Tom was the one who did it?
How did you find out that Tom enjoys doing that?
My dad sometimes goes to Australia for business.
My father usually leaves home while I am in bed.
Tom doesn\'t know the first thing about fishing.
Tom doesn\'t know the reason why Mary is absent.
Tom doesn\'t know what to do with all his money.
Tom doesn\'t know when Mary is supposed to come.
Everybody knows that he lost his leg in the war.
Everybody was anxious to know what had happened.
Is this the first time you\'ve tried doing this?
It doesn\'t cost much to eat at that restaurant.
It doesn\'t matter to me, but it matters to Tom.
It doesn\'t seem like Tom will go any time soon.
Tom accepted the nomination for class president.
Tom can come over to my place whenever he wants.
Tom can reach me at this number any time of day.
Tom can speak French better than the rest of us.
